name: ThreatQ
description: Integrates a variety of ThreatQ services into Splunk SOAR

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity

indicator_list.description: A comma-separated or line-separated list of indicator values

exact.description: Do we want to find an exact match or an approximate match?

with_all_relationships.description: Should we fetch all relationships with this action?

indicator_list.description: A comma-separated or line-separated list of indicators and indicator type (optional) name/value pairs (e.g.: IP Address: 1.1.1.1)

indicator_status.description: The default status for the indicators uploaded to ThreatQ

adversary_list.description: A comma-separated or line-separated list of adversary names

object_list.description: A comma-separated or line-separated list of custom object values

object_type.description: The object type of the specified list values

actions.description: Adds an attribute to objects in ThreatQ

object_list.description: A comma-separated or line-separated list of object values

object_type.description: The object type of the specified list values

attribute_name.description: The name of the attribute in ThreatQ

attribute_value.description: The value fo the attribute in ThreatQ

actions.description: Set a status for a given list of indicators

indicator_list.description: A comma-separated or line-separated list of indicators and indicator type (optional) name/value pairs (e.g.: IP Address: 1.1.1.1)

indicator_status.description: The status to give to the list of indicators

assigned_to.description: ThreatQ user to assign the task to

indicator_list.description: List of indicator values (use format node)
List of comma-separated or line-separated indicator
List of comma-separated or line-separated indicator

actions.description: Upload a spearphish attempt to ThreatQ

vault_id.description: The Vault ID for the spearphish email file

indicator_status.description: Default indicator status. If none selected, Review is used

actions.description: Upload (and parse) a file to ThreatQ

vault_id.description: The Vault ID for the file to upload

parse_for_indicators.description: Whether or not to parse the file for indicators

indicator_status.description: Default indicator status. If none selected, Review is used

actions.description: Query ThreatQ for an object's relationships

object_list.description: A comma-separated or line-separated list of custom object values

object_type.description: The object type of the specified list values

related_object_type.description: The object type of the relationships you want to find
